thread.section_title: TackleDirect Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TackleDirect | www.tackledirect.com | 5 of 118
thread.title: Jeffrey Drake

author: Jeffrey Drake
title: Jeffrey Drake
text:
During the holiday season 2016, I ordered two surf rods and two bait casting reels as gifts for my sons. I was immediately notified one of the bait casting reels was back ordered, yikes! Christmas was fast approaching but the folks at TackleDirect checked all their available resources and managed to find one from another dealer with no cost increase and I still received everything in time for Christmas.
Nice work!
